text: Jean Tissier (1896â€“1973) was a French stage, film and television actor.Goble p.440 A prolific actor, he had more than two hundred fifty appearances on screen during his career. He was married to the actress Georgette Tissier. ==Selected filmography== * A Rare Bird (1935) * The Bread Peddler (1950) * Crime at the Concert Mayol (1954) * And Your Sister?
